name: Toybox: One Button Brawl
description:
Battle your friends to determine who truly is the master brawler in this raucous One Button experience.

Controls:
Single Press - Jump

Double Tap - Use RED Power-Ups

Double Tap HOLD - Use BLUE Power-Ups

Quit - Escape (Keyboard) or Select (Controller)

Created by:
Jotham Bate, Emily Newton, Julian Fraile and Michael Roe

Crafted in Unreal Engine 4
